title: Wedding at York
brief_description: The wedding of HRH the Duke of Kent and Miss Katherine Worsley at York Minster. As the bride leavers her home, members of the Royal Family assemble at the great cathedral. The arrival of Her Majesty the Queen with Prince Philip and Prince Charles is followed by the ceremony at which Dr Ramsey, then Archbishop of York, officiated. The wedding over, the bride and her husband leave the cathedral to the cheers of waiting crowds.
